title: Video: Chloe Black – Breaking Bad
body:
As much as I love _Breaking Bad_, it could do with new opening credits music, right? Well London via LA songstress **Chloe Black** may well have found the answer, with her fantastic new track, _Breaking Bad_.

Perhaps more Bond than Heisenberg, it sits somewhere between Adele and Amy Winehouse, soulful whilst retaining it’s pop foundations. Watch out 2014, Chloe Black is coming to get you. Thanks to [DN](disconaivete.com) for the tip.

Perhaps more Bond than Heisenberg, it sits somewhere between Adele and Amy Winehouse, soulful whilst retaining it’s pop foundations. \[…\]
